name: World Without Reason
storyline:
Two years ago in the autumn of 2043, a mysterious figure known as "The Shadow Reaper" tore through the island nation of Calloway City before suddenly vanishing, taking 24 USSA Peacekeepers with him.

Almost a year later in the summer of 2044, the Shadow Reaper struck again, this time causing a whopping 32 members of the Calloway City senate to fall into a coma.

It is now the summer of 2045.

Two years have passed since the Shadow Reaper claimed his first victim. His methods were never discovered, and neither could the available evidence point to any one suspect.

With the investigation hitting a standstill, the case has all but gone cold.

Our protagonist has been called down to the police station to testify about the Shadow Reaper, but her memory of the last two years is worryingly hazy.

Can she recall enough details about the case, and her life, before both escape her?
summary: A visual novel about a young adult living through several key moments in her life, as she tries to remember important details about her past.
